translation: For I desire to observe those who are assembled here to fight, wishing to please in battle the evil-minded Duryodhanaâ€”the son of Dhritarashtra.
commentary: 1.23 fighting with the object of fighting? Observe observe? I'm I? These who? Ete those? Here here (in this Kurukshetra)? assembled assembled? Dhritarashtrasya of the son of Dhritarashtra? of the evilminded? in battle in battle? priyachikirshavah wishing to please.No Commentary.
